title: Special NFL Trivia Show!
description:
Welcome back to (debatable) with hosts Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Mina Kimes! On today’s show: NFL trivia! Find out if Pablo and Domonique can join forces to defeat Team Kimes. The list of categories includes topics such as offseason moves, quarterbacks, NFL recent history and weird football. Watch as we discuss players ranging from Baker Mayfield to Cooper Kupp, and teams ranging from the Chiefs to the Seahawks.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
